website_summaries.verdict: A well-made model that's crafted to last with styling that fits most home decor. This step stool is as good-looking as it is practical.
pros: An attractive solid wood 2-step stool that's available in choice of 2 finishes
Has a hand hole that makes it easy to carry
cons: Takes up a bit of space to store

customer_reviews.title: Great stool - ridiculous price it's twice the fair market ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stool - ridiculous price it's twice the fair market price. Bought this stool to build a learning tower, good product, sturdy no complaints. Never thought about checking Ikea website as i figured this would be fairly priced. Just disappointed in the ripoff process.
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stool to make a kitchen helper for my grandbaby...all I can say is OMG!!! How perfect!!! He can climb in and out all by himself and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great stool!
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen was built for giants so this is exactly what I needed. I leave it out since I frequently need to use the stool to get into my cabinets. The stool was relatively easy for my husband to put together; it’s fairly lightweight but very sturdy, and nearly matches the color scheme in my kitchen. The bottom step is a bit narrow but overall this stool was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: alermc

customer_reviews.title: drill doesn't work you need to hand screw all of them it was hard....
customer_reviews.text: It was really hard to assemble all of them together as a woman...i believe it is beech wood but even if this is good quality raw wood, it needs extra strength with your finger to screw it was really painful! the step is very high too(my toddler is almost three years old and she said, "mom, this is too high..." it depends on the height, but it is not suitable for our bathroom sink but good for the kitchen countertop that she now can reach to.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to kid friendly household items
customer_reviews.text: Husband said it was fairly simple to put together. He really liked the alan wrench with the 3D printed grip. He said it really improved usefulness and ease of use. The stool itself is used in the kitchen to help our 6 year old reach things without climbing. Its really aided in developing independence and we no longer fear for our cabinet doors. Planning on buying a second for the bathroom. Highly recommend. Only criticism is that I wish it were cheaper but I'm sure it'll be used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bekvan Wooden 2 step ladder - great product
customer_reviews.text: IKEA used to sell this; not carrying it any more. Went to several stores before a knowledgeable employee told us they discontinued it!! The product is exactly the right height for my 3yr old grand daughter to reach the faucet and wash her hands... study, assembly instructions 90% easy, screws took a little energy to turn. Very happy with the product- we bought the unfinished model and painted it white.
customer_reviews.author: c y mar

customer_reviews.title: Check IKEA - HUGE PRICE MARKUP!
customer_reviews.text: Stool is nice for what it is. We bought it without checking the original retailer. It's currently $19.99 on IKEA's website.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: When the person put my mailbox up he put it way too high for me (he was 6'-5" and I am 5'-4" and I need a step to just reach the dang mailbox! I do not want to drill more holes in my stucco, so a step is in order! LOL This little step is just perfect for my covered porch for me to reach my mailbox! I will paint it to match my house! I feel steady when I climb up on it, which is important since I am up in the years (63) and have an artificial hip! No falling for me thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Rese Davison

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I bought them right after ikea stopped carrying them. They were more than double the price as ikea had them for but because I couldn’t get them there anymore I was glad to have the option to buy them here. I use these for my 2 and 4 year olds to help in the kitchen and as chairs at the dining table as they sit a couple inches higher than a regular chair.
customer_reviews.author: Cherise

customer_reviews.title: Good Item, but screw holes didn't align
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'd still say this item is exactly what I was looking for. However, I was disappointed that the screw holes for the bottom step didn't line up so it is not secure or safe for my toddler to use without drilling a new hole. This is annoying since it is supposed to be a quick assembly. Otherwise, the stool is nice and would be a very easy assembly. I thought about returning it, but my toddler is already so excited to finally reach the sink by herself that I don't want to wait for another one. I'm sure most don't have this problem, but unfortunately ours did.
customer_reviews.author: john P

customer_reviews.title: it feels flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We used to have Ikea Bekvam step stool, but a leg broke, so we looked on ikea and it seemed discontinued. Then I ordered online on amazon. We received it and it's nothing like the older step stool. There is a difference in material quality (top appears not polished and rough), craftsmanship and it's lighter than original one. From comparing both I'd say it's a fake. It is also not like the picture advertised, color is ligher than expected. It does not have paper logos of Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: nnathalie

customer_reviews.title: Great height for helping my 2
customer_reviews.text: Great height for helping my 2.5 year old reach counter height in the kitchen but it needs work to get it to be safe enough to use. Two problems - my child is light so if she leans forward it slips! I haven't looked into buying grips. The quick solution I tried with pieces of rug pad did not work. Then, I think I got a faulty one because the bottom step's screw was not aligned to the hole. All other pieces fit together. I have to get wood glue to solve that.
customer_reviews.author: macka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We loved the first one we got so much we ordered 2! Perfect height for my toddler in the kitchen and bathroom and WAY cheaper than one of those helper towers. As long as your kid is steady on their feet, should work no problem. The wood is not painted/stained, which I like because we might make it an art project at some point. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Authentic bekvam stool
customer_reviews.text: Waited for months for this to restock at IKEA and it never did. I stumbled across this and while the price is about double what it retailed for at the store, I couldn’t pass it up. Genuine IKEA stool, assembly was easy enough, I was able to put it together in less than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: ERO_foto

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: Used to make a "workstation" for a toddler. Added $15.00 worth of pine to make it, matched pretty good. Wood glued everything when assembling. Very sturdy, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth T Augustine

customer_reviews.title: It's Ikea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stool for my kids to reach the upper cabinets in our kitchen and it works for that just fine. A little warning, the stool comes unfinished and unsanded so a little work has to happen to make it feel finished. I also added felt pads to the legs because it made a terrible noise when the kids pushed it across the kitchen. It is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly (defective)
customer_reviews.text: I generally really like this stool, but I spent x4 more on this stool than the cost at IKEA, and it's defective. I assembled tens of items from IKEA in the past, and I never once had a quality issue before. I always assemble them on a flat surface, and I make sure to only tighten the screws at the end. Something was just not right with the angles of the holes for the screws. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Uri Klarman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, works as intended, but just pricey.
customer_reviews.text: As the title says. It was easy for husband to assemble in under 20 minutes, and it's perfect height for my 18-19 month old to use to get to the sink in the bathroom kitchen, or kitchen island. It's just pricey on amazon vs if it was available straight from ikea.
customer_reviews.author: JSE

customer_reviews.title: Used it for learning tower
customer_reviews.text: We used this to make a learning tower for our toddler. I think the stool itself is a bit overpriced but gave us a nice base to build on and has held up for nearly two years now.
customer_reviews.author: SSpillies

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS CHAIR! BUT BEWARE THE PRICE IS EXTREMLY UNFAIR. IKEA SELLS THIS FOR JUST 19.99! Had I known that, I wouldn't have bought it on amazon. Otherwise, it is a great chair
customer_reviews.author: vvtmx

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen stool
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy stool that is just the right height for my taller kitchen cupboards. We bought the unfinished one and painted it blue to match our kitchen island, adds a nice bit of pizzazz. I saw one reviewer caution about the stool becoming slippery from painting, but the surface of ours is just a tiny bit rough even after painting, so it seems just fine. I will add no-slip strips later if it seems otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: KB in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, so awesome! Way better than I expected. And here's the kicker ---- we had NO chairs in our house for a couple of weeks after a move, and I was able to use this as an OFFICE chair (I'm 5'8"). It's the perfect height and the little step is great for my feet. Just add a pillow on top and go. It's also beautiful if you're into Scandi-type design.
customer_reviews.author: matthew b henniges

customer_reviews.title: really nice
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and very handy to have around. I had some trouble getting some screws but my neighbor helped me. It seems very sturdy. Is nice to use as a side table with couch too
customer_reviews.author: S sceglier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a specific style and color, but nothing match my preference. This was perfect! It was easy to assemble and easy to custom it to my own liking!
customer_reviews.author: paperandiTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sturdy stool
customer_reviews.text: Such a perfect stool for our little one. Solid wood, very sturdy and fits perfectly under the bathroom vanity! We put rubber pads under the feet so she can move it around through the house as she pleases without scratching up floors.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the beige, thinking it had a clear coat on it. It’s bare wood. It works for my intended use, but I would prefer a finish on it. For the price....
customer_reviews.author: My Dog Loves Me

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stool. I found it easy to assemble and it really does help me where I need a small boost. I do recommend either sealing the wood or getting someone to seal it for you so the stool can last longer and wont get stained with food or other daily items.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fahl

customer_reviews.title: Not just a step stool.
customer_reviews.text: This step tool is being used in our camper. I'm the short one who can't reach the back of the shelf so this is perfect. We also had a problem with the table that turns into a bed. This step stool was altered slightly (and was perfectly made to alter) to fit under the table to secure it from toppling over when a guest uses this bed. Dule purpose in the camper is always good.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: This is nice wooden stool
customer_reviews.text: This is nice wooden stool. We use it for our two year old to climb up to to the bathroom sink. It is pretty sturdy and the top is wide enough for him to stand. Be careful, though, to close the door as kids will climb up on this if they are by themselves and could easily fall. Parent supervision definitely needed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Upton

customer_reviews.title: Great stool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stool, just wish it was a tad less $. But, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great basic step!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect basic step stool so I can reach the top of my closet, light and easy to move around, fits into any decor.
customer_reviews.author: John McCorvie

customer_reviews.title: Great little stool
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Sturdy enough for average adult.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sprinkle around the house
customer_reviews.text: We have four or five of these now, handy, simple, nicely designed
customer_reviews.author: DCT

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this stool it is sturdy and looks nice. I love the natural look. I am 5 ft tall and we moved into a place with higher cabinets in the kitchen so I got this to reach stuff and it feel safe. We have not gotten end tables for the couch so this stool is a make shift end table for the moment! Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, doesn't fold.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because of price and because it seems sturdy. When purchasing, keep in mind it doesn't fold and takes a lot of space, not ideal for small rooms (like small bathrooms etc.).
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy. A lot more expensive on Amazon. Buy at Ikea
customer_reviews.author: farmwifemccoy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: A great household step stool that my husband and I use on a daily basis. We even decorated it with a wood burner.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble for IKEA
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, stylish footstool. Its IKEA, so not the best, not bad, just above average quality. Great value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ready Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stools!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! We actually painted them to match our home and they’re wonderful! Good quality and easy to assemble. They’re great for the kids to use to reach higher stuff and help in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Teena

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, But Nice
customer_reviews.text: The price seems very high for what it is, however, the assembly was easy and the stool is very sturdy. A great purchase despite the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time! The whole family! A little pricey but it's really solid still comes apart nicely for moving. Tall enough for my 1 year old to reach the counter in the bathroom and kitchen! Love Ikea 😍
customer_reviews.author: Misty M

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait. Discontinued at IKEA
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to receive these but, considering the fact that they are now discontinued at IKEA, it was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: great height to access even the top of cabinets at ...
customer_reviews.text: very solid, great height to access even the top of cabinets at 5'2" plenty light enough to move around with hand hole in top step.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: easy to build if you read instructions :)
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product it seems sturdy. However I am using it as a bed side table and not as a step stool. Its exactly what I was looking for and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gretta

customer_reviews.title: and she put it together herself and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her dorm room (has those high beds), and she put it together herself and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but light
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but light! Slightly slippery when I step down on the wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the directions carefully, it's a snap to put this together. I recommend that you carefully check before you fully tighten the screws. It's quite sturdy. Nice clean lines. The usual, generic Ikea "blond" color. I plan to paint mine. If you Google "Bekvam makeover", there are some gorgeous paint jobs.
customer_reviews.author: SAR

customer_reviews.title: When it was delivered from Amazon I put it together in about 15 minute and it's super solid! If things don't line up when your .
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this stool before, but lost it in a move. When it was delivered from Amazon I put it together in about 15 minute and it's super solid! If things don't line up when your building it, don't be scared to take it apart and start over reading the instructions. I've since taken it apart and stained the wood to a cherry red! Put it back to get her! It's now red and even more awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Voelker

customer_reviews.title: Great stool
customer_reviews.text: This stool is what I was looking for it’s very sturdy perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy heavy weight- type stool. I have two now. One upstairs one downstairs. Great for big guys who don't want to use ladder
customer_reviews.author: m ritchie

customer_reviews.title: This item is no longer available in IKEA stores.
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that the top of the stool has a slot which is very handy for carrying the stool from place to place. The newer model available from the manufacturer doesn't have this slot.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Kaluk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and sturdy, easy to put together- my 12 year old had it out of the box and together before I got home.
customer_reviews.author: K. Purcell

customer_reviews.title: It's a project!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it was RAW WOOD, which I had to stain and seal. I also didn't realize the amount of assembly required. It took several tries to get it right. This was a much bigger project than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Review other prices
customer_reviews.text: Received the stool yesterday and assembled it in about 30 minutes or less. Very nice product. After finding out this is an IKEA product I checked the IKEA site for price and found I could have purchased directly from IKEA for half the price including shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sturdy stool that had some style that I could leave out. This is perfect. Very hard wood and I love the color. (But you could stain).
customer_reviews.author: gloria keown

customer_reviews.title: Needs non-slip covers for the feet
customer_reviews.text: Love the sturdy stool except that for a toddler using it at a sink it slides out from under her when she leans forward. I'm searching for rubber feet to put on it. Also, it's way more expensive here than at ikea but it was my only way of getting it since ikea does not ship to Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Hakes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to put together and the perfect height. It’s really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: Love it - use as a step stool and as a chair for my five year olds desk.
customer_reviews.author: mtnclmbr123

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this step stool for my kitchen! It’s really strong!! Excelent!!️
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stool
customer_reviews.text: It was really really hard for my brother to put together, but I bet it's that way so it stays tight. He struggled with it for about an hour. The first time I stepped on it I was terrified it would buckle. It is SO sturdy. I know this will be around for a very long time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Everyday Use: Photo Prop, Kitchen Tool, Step Stool for Bed, great after surgery to get into bed.
customer_reviews.text: We use this stool everyday. I was going to paint it. I probably will eventually when my daughter decides to color on it with permeant marker... we all know that will eventually happen. i will paint it, but it has been great for everyday use: in the kitchen, step stool to get into my daughter's bed, as a photo prop, etc. It has held up very well for years. My best friend has one too and hers in still in great shape too. I forgot this was really great after surgery. My father-in-law was staying with us after Heart Surgery. He used this stool to get up into bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Uneven
customer_reviews.text: The steps tools is beautiful and feels high quality, however the two side frames came uneven so it wobbles from the 2 corners. Disappointed and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Solves a problem.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a three year old child in our family and he loves it. Now, he can reach the sink to wash his hands and brush his teeth. His mother stained it to match the bathroom cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: tall
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for my grandson to use while helping me cook. unfortunately it also allows him to push it over to the counters and get things off of them. overall very nice-sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma3

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, all tools are included. Perfect for my daughter helping me in the kitchen. Very sturdy & looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Great stool- required assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great stool- required assembly. Husband used drill bit instead of Allen wrench that it came with & went much faster. Purchased for a kitchen helper for my child. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: BBartol

customer_reviews.title: great product, a bit tricky to assemble but very ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, a bit tricky to assemble but very doable even for a novice, and very solid when done. I wish I had paid more attention to the negative reviews, way overpriced compared to buying directly from Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: Poopkitty

customer_reviews.title: Love this stool!
customer_reviews.text: This item was SO WORTH THE PRICE. Just a simple, well made, unfinished wood stool that is easy to assemble and very sturdy. We keep it in the kitchen and use it ALL the time. May buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy J. Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together. Comes unfinished. I had it stained and personalized for a housewarming gift. They loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have the unfinished version of this. It is tricky to keep clean but I should stain it. It is very sturdy and excellent for kids because of that. My kids use it all the time although it was for 'mom'. I love this stool and I am looking to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Mautino

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: So much better than I expected for the price. Very sturdy and the natural light color goes perfectly in my slightly modern birch nursery. I needed something to reach the hight shelf in the closet and the top drawers of a very tall chest of drawers my husband made.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine

customer_reviews.title: Ikea Bekvam Step Stool
customer_reviews.text: This step stool was easy to assemble and sturdy, but I suggest going to IKEA to buy this because it's lot cheaper over there.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My three year old daughter loves helping me cook on this!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Y.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: First step holes didn't line up for final screw, but stays in place regardless. Sturdy and nice on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: edithpetuna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were not great but other than that it's a solid, sturdy stool.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Antonition

customer_reviews.title: Great stool!
customer_reviews.text: We coverted this to a toddler stool. Used the step stool as a base and stained it. Very sturdy and made for a quick and easy project!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Treece

customer_reviews.title: Great Stool!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I didn't realize it came unfinished. I was able to stain and finish it to match my kitchen. Sturdy and good height. Also chair height so it can be used as extra seating.
customer_reviews.author: dthom

customer_reviews.title: Nice step stool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, solid wood, and better looking than expected.
customer_reviews.author: AGM

customer_reviews.title: color is different
customer_reviews.text: I order the wood color but it is much lighter than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Min K.

customer_reviews.title: Great stool!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the way it is built! Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W Sabo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not difficult to assemble and extremely sturdy. Doesnt take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen stool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stool for our kitchen. It was super easy to put together, in fact my 5 year old was so excited about doing most of the steps herself. It helps my daughter reach items in the kitchen, and it helps me reach super high cabinets. I like the light wood, I actually don't mind it sitting out in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Gorraiz

customer_reviews.title: 5 star stool at 1 star price.  It's cheaper from Ikea, and that's where it comes from anyway.
customer_reviews.text: This stool is 150% more expensive on Amazon. Ikea sells it for $15. I didn't realize this until it showed up covered in Ikea packaging, and looked it up. Now, about the stool... It assembles quicly and easily, and like all Ikea products, they have mastered the art of diy assembly. The directions are clear. Everything fits together perfectly. The tools work exceptionally well (the design of the allen wrench was probably the most impressive part of this stool). It is unfinished, so you'll need to finish it, but it's hard to match wood grains, so we're using it in a closet, and painting it to match a couple accent pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love this stool.
customer_reviews.text: This stool was the perfect size for me. Easy to assemble and sturdy. I can reach the top cabinet and bookcase with ease. Painting it to match my built-ins and it looks nice there beside them.
customer_reviews.author: anita B Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and practical step stool
customer_reviews.text: There's effort involved to put the Bekvam step stool together but the instructions are complete and relatively easy to follow. It took about 40 minutes for one person to do from start to finish. The pieces fit together properly, the stool is solid, and the finish is decent. It's not meant to be fine furniture but it works well in the closet to reach a higher shelf. It was a good value and I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: LightPixie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gives that extra boost that I needed for those extra tall cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: CindyD "Stylz"

customer_reviews.title: Nice little stool and fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Nice little stool and fairly easy to assemble. Bought it for my two-year-old grandson so he could reach the sink and it seem to work well for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dagmon

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A great height for my short toddler and very sturdy. It slips a tiny bit at times on tile floor, but I could easily add felt or rubber to the bottom of the legs.
customer_reviews.author: AuntBB

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My two year old pushes it around to help out.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Use this stool for everything from reaching into high kitchen cabinets to kids using as a seat. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Pietras-Allison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy without being extremely heavy, well made and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Reviews

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy but it needs to be put together and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would buy it again. It is very sturdy but it needs to be put together and the wood is unfinished.
customer_reviews.author: patsbowwow

customer_reviews.title: Tall
customer_reviews.text: Wish the top step weren't quite so high, but this was the only one I could find that was two steps and was tall enough.
customer_reviews.author: bumbleb177

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This think can hold the weight of Fat Albert and have 400 lbs to spare. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: B. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good looking stool..
customer_reviews.text: I love this foot stool. It's sturdy and perfectly sized for the kitchen and laundry areas. I have two of these. One in black for the tool room along with this birch. One thing to keep in mind is the steps are unfinished so they're not suitable for barefoot. I sprayed a little bit of clear coat paint on the steps and then hand sanded them. Surprisingly, these took quite a bit of tme to put together and you best have a power screwdriver with you. I bought the second stool out of desperation since there isn't anything out there that has the form and function of this ikea stool.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great buy & love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the step stool. It's very cute and makes it much easier for my kids to wash hands at our kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. I built the upper "cage" to it for safety. Very pleased with the product.

product_meta.title: IKEA BEKVAM Wooden Utility Step by Ikea (Beige)
product_meta.description: Color:BeigeSolid wood is a durable natural material. Hand-hole in the top step makes the step stool easy to move For maximum quality, re-tighten the screws about two weeks after assembly. Do not paint the step stool with ordinary paint due to the risk of slipping. However, you can treat it with BEHANDLA glazing paint to make the surface less slippery, more durable and personal. Care instructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Wipe dry with a clean cloth. This product requires assembly
feature_bullets: Solid wood is a durable natural material.
Hand-hole in the top step makes the step stool easy to move.
Designer: Nike Karlsson. This product requires assembly
